channel.title: Speaker on Erin's Audio Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Speaker on Erin's Audio Corner

item.title: Purifi Audio PTT4.0W04-01A 4 Inch Midwoofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information The Purifi Audio PTT4.0W04 is a long linear throw 4-inch midwoofer which costs about $580/pair USD.

item.title: SB Acoustics SB17CAC35-4 6 Inch Ceramic Midwoofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information Per Madisound: SB Ceramic cones consist of an aluminum/ceramic dual layer cone.

item.title: Klipsch Heresy IV Speaker Review
item.description: Intro The Klipsch Heresy IV is a 3-way speaker with a classic look. The Heresy IV features a 12-inch midwoofer, K-702 midrange compression driver, and K-704 Tractrix horn for high frequencies.

item.title: Revel PerformaBe F226Be Floorstanding Speaker Review

item.title: Selah Audio Purezza Bookshelf Speaker Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Intro This speaker comes to us from the mind of fellow DIY’r and speaker builder, Rick Craig of Selah Audio.

item.title: Audio Development SW800 8-Inch Woofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information Before I dive in I want to note that this is a dual voice coil (DVC) woofer with dual 3.

item.title: AudioFrog GS8ND2 8-Inch Woofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information Before I dive in I want to note that this is a dual voice coil (DVC) woofer with dual 2 Ohm coil configurable in parallel or in series.

item.title: AudioFrog GB60 6 Inch Midwoofer Review
item.description: Information Note: These speakers are designed specifically for car audio use and come with a kit of mounting gear such as adapter rings, grilles and additional installation hardware.

item.title: Dyn Audio MW182 10-Inch Woofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information Per the manual: The Esotec MW 182 is a 24 cm (10 inch) diameter woofer equipped with an extremely large, 100 mm (4 inch) diameter voice coil with a dual centered magnet system driving the MSP cone to ensure the greatest possible power handling.

item.title: Dyn Audio MW172 8-Inch Mid/Woofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information Per the manual: The new Esotec MW 172 is a 20 cm (8 inch) diameter mid/woofer designed for high performance two-and three way systems.

item.title: OEM 2019 Honda Civic Door Speaker Review
item.description: Information This speaker came from my very own 2019 Honda Civic Sport (non-Touring model). Standard stereo system (no upgrade).

item.title: Audio Development W800NEO Drive Unit Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information The Audio Develoopment W800NEO is a shallow mount 8-inch midbass with (I am told) a retail price of $800/pair.
